activation.reactionTrigger: An ally you can see that is no more than one size larger than you falls.

system.description: When an ally you can see that is no more than one size larger than you falls, you may use your reaction to move up to your speed provided you end your movement within 5 feet of the path of your ally’s fall. Make a Strength saving throw against the DC of whatever effect caused your ally to fall. (Alternatively, make a DC 10 Strength saving throw if there is no clear DC). On a success, you grapple your ally and negate any falling damage.
